code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const STATUS_MAP={discussion:{label:'üó®Ô∏è In Discussion',color:'#00bfff'},active:{label:'‚úÖ Active',color:'#00e676'},broken:{label:'‚ùå Broken',color:'#ff4d4d'},expired:{label:'‚åõ Expired',color:'#ffb300'},other:{label:'‚ùì Other',color:'#aaa'},'in-progress':{label:'üõ†Ô∏è In Progress',color:'#ffb300'},completed:{label:'‚úÖ Completed',color:'#00e676'},planned:{label:'üóìÔ∏è Planned',color:'#00bfff'}};export default function StatusBadge(_ref){let{status}=_ref;const s=STATUS_MAP[status]||{label:status,color:'#aaa'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"status-badge",style:{color:s.color,borderColor:s.color,fontWeight:'bold',borderRadius:8,padding:'0.3em 1.2em',background:'var(--primary-bg)',border:'1.5px solid',whiteSpace:'nowrap',display:'inline-flex',alignItems:'center'},children:s.label});}
